name: Snoozle (itch)
description:
Snoozle

Snoozle is a small puzzle game that was created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam 2021. It has 8 levels, though more might be added in the future.

(There are some out-of-bounce glitches which have been fixed in the new version, which will be available after the voting is done)

Controls:
WASD to move Gigi
R to restart

Credits:

Ellesian (programming): Twitter | itch.io

Jazzyns (music/art/concept): Twitter

Glimmer sound effect from Vilkas Sound - Free Music & SFX
